fields.request: Validate screen Send Net Message layout padding
fields.request_details:
1. Sign into the Django admin and open Nodes → Net messages → Send Net Message or browse to /admin/nodes/netmessage/send/.
2. Confirm the Subject/Body column and the filters column have consistent padding so content is not flush against the grid divider.
3. Verify the Send message button renders with larger padding for better tap/click targets while preserving the Cancel link styling.
4. Submit a test message and confirm the page processes without UI regressions.
